name: Steampunk: A Text Adventure
description:
Created by Steven Zachary, Colby Prince, John MacDougall, Jack Becker  for the 2015 NHTI Game Jam.

A text adventure with wild choices, bold consequences, and some humorous endings.

"You awaken in a brothel known as the White Harem[...] you feel and see yourself tied to a chair[...] What do you do?"
